issues.issueMessage:
Field description: Information describing the active/selected elements of the receiver coil.
This does not correspond to a tag in the DICOM ontology.
The vendor-defined terminology for active coil elements can go in this field.
Field description: A general description of the pulse sequence used for the scan.

Field description: The direction where only partial Fourier information was collected.
Corresponds to [DICOM Tag 0018, 9036](https://dicomlookup.com/dicomtags/(0018,9036)) `Partial Fourier Direction`.

Field description: The department in the institution in charge of the equipment that produced
the measurements.
